content: *an intricate pattern makes this crocheted afghan a stunning addition to any room shown in waverly for bernat bernat com * materials waverly®for bernat® 100 g/3 5 oz 180 m/197 yds curry 55514 9 balls size 5 5 mm u s i or 9 crochet hook worked flat in 4-row pattern finish with rounds of edging pattern for 4 10 cm crochet pattern chart and written instructions are provided in pdf download
